name: Shurale
damageDescription: digs his long, aged fingernails deep into your stomach, attempting to rip your organs out.

dialogue.message: Oh little one, what are you doing in this forest?

responses.response: I'm looking for my leader's wife.
That is none of your business. (Intimidate)
Please help me find the way to my Anastasia. (Persuade)

dialogue.message: OOOhhh!! The one kidnapped by Zhalmauyz Kempir, an ugly witch, which desires to steal her beauty with magic. And now why is it that you wish to find this kidnapped Anastasia?

responses.response: Wow, I thought it was another tribe which kidnapped her. I want to help my leader and become honoured.

dialogue.message: I don't care anyway. Okay... bye.
Okay, I will help you. I have nothing to do anyways. Continue further east and go under the waterfall. Bye.
